Name: RingBeamer
Notes: A spiked mechanical enemy that emits circular shockwaves that electrocute the player upon contact. It is stationary and cannot be destroyed through any means.

Obj_arg0.Name: Ring Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which the individual rings grow. Default is 20.

Obj_arg1.Name: Ring Duration
Obj_arg1.Description: The life time of an individual ring before it disappears. Default is 100.

Obj_arg2.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg2.Description: The color frame to be used by the individual rings.

SW_A.Description: It remains passive while this switch is not activated.

SW_B.Description: It will become passive after activating this switch.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Group.Description: If one Ring Beamer in this group emits a ring, all of the other Ring Beamers will do so as well.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and frozen by player 2.
